Reviews.Title: Fugifilm S1800 is a great value
Reviews.Author: T. Kindrick
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera after a few months of researching point and shoot digitals. I bought a Sony P&S; in Dec. '09 for almost $200.00 but it was limited to 3x Optical Zoom so I returned it. I decided to wait until I could afford an entry level DSLR so I would have more control over all the setting and focusing features but I was in a Radio Shack one day when I saw the S1500 and I really liked it. I went online to check out camera reviews and they were very positive so I went to Amazon to check out prices. That's when I found the S1800. I bought it because it has more Optical Zoom and it basically the same price.I have been very pleased with the photos it takes. The only drawback I found is the time it takes to auto focus and it was slightly smaller than I thought. The size isn't really a factor for most people but I have large hands and slight nerve damage in my neck that causes my hands to shake. The anti-shaking features work very well but it does take longer for me to focus at high zooms because of the shaking.I would recommend this camera very much for anyone who wants to take the next step in digital photography and can't afford a DSLR.ALSO the bundled package was a fantastic value. I HIGHLY recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a very reasonable cost
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I bought Fujifilm Finepix S1800 a month ago, and so far have taken over 700 pictures, both indoor and outdoor. The camera is the best in this price (approx. $ 180-200). I've searched the whole net, and checked all other brands, such as Canon, Nikon, Sony, Pentax, Kodak, but none have a camera at this cost and so many capabilities. I specially enjoyed the X18 optical zoom, scene recognition, panorama and burst mode. None of the peer cameras have 18 zoom at this price range. The quality of photoes are very good, but it may take a bit longer so one knows how to set everything for outdoor photography, specially in low light conditions. I suggest buying the bundle as bought it. It comes with 8 GB memory card, a card reader, case, batteries and charger, etc. I paid $ 229 for the bundle and I'm very happy! If I wanted to buy all these stuff separately, I'd to pay much more!So, I highly recommend, both the camera and the bundle!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic FujiFilm
Reviews.Author: Dottie A. Pierce
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I've ever tried.The image quality is magnificent. I get great pictures every time in any kind of lighting.I also love how this camera has a manual setting. More experienced photographers can set the desired aperture and shutter speed. But it also has scene recognition and auto settings for when there's no time to mess with controls.Not to mention the great price. I saw this same camera offered for sky high prices elsewhere; not including the accessories and memory card!I HIGHLY recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: FUJI FINEPIX S1800 CAMERA BUNDLE PACKAGE
Reviews.Author: DAVE T. "DAVE T,"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this bundle package and took it on a two week vacation,took hundred of pictures and was wery well pleased with the ease of operation of the camera and accesories.

Reviews.Title: fuji fun
Reviews.Author: mountainfolk
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a month now and could not be happier. great picture quality and the ease of use for beginners and the preprogrammable settings for those who have a lot of skill are wrapped in one. for the price this is hard to beat. this is also a good starter kit to build from.

Reviews.Title: Good transaction
Reviews.Author: MSavala
Reviews.Content: Everyting about the transaction was smooth and painless.  I love the camera, and the bonus items made opening the package like Christmas.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great product for starters
Reviews.Author: C. Nelson Wills
Reviews.Content: Following some cursory research on the net, I felt like this camera gave me this biggest bang for the buck for a start up photographer. I really like the camera and the kit had everything I needed to get started. I would recommend this to any begginer like myself.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for..
Reviews.Author: LISA
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that was more like my Nikon 35mm camera, but digital and not heavy to carry.It takes great pictures, love the zoom and I can still carry it in my purse. It's also easy to use, which is great, because I don't like alot of fancy instructions. I would buy this camera again!

Reviews.Title: A lot of fluff
Reviews.Author: Elmer
Reviews.Content: The rechargable batteries & charger are great. The memory card reader is wonderful. The other stuff went to storage. I'm keeping out the tripod, but in 4 months I haven't needed a four inch tripod. Now I would find a good card reader & skip the rest.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: DarkPoet
Reviews.Content: I really don't have anything negative to say. All this for $179? It's a steal in my book. The only minor gripe that I have is that the pictures tend to be a little blurry when fully zoomed. Other than that, it's a great, feature-packed camera that takes excellent pictures. I'm very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Buy this camera!
Reviews.Author: Lit Lover
Reviews.Content: My experience w/digital cameras has been dismal from Sony to Nikon to maybe a Canon somewhere down the line. I learned on a gorgeous 35mm Leica from WW II era and so point & shoots have always been problematic for me. Main problem is that I could never seem to get sharp focus using the back display rather than a viewfinder which VERY few digital cameras have until you spend $500 or more. My search is over, however. I can get sharp clean edges with the viewfinder on this camera and I don't need an engineering degree to figure out the controls; it's pretty intuitive and I never thought I would say that about a digital camera. I purchased the Finepix in this package deal and am so glad I did so. It's a fabulous value. Thank you thank you thank you Fujifilm. I love my camera.

Reviews.Title: fujifilm finepix S1800 kit
Reviews.Author: Julie Dykstra
Reviews.Content: Arrived in a timely manner. Reasonable price. Only complaint was the camera case, which was defective. Stitching around the clasp coming apart, not made to last.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: J. Bradley
Reviews.Content: So far I really like this camera. I have not finished reading the manual but the basic functions were pretty easy to understand. Sometimes it does not snap as fast as I want it to...I may need to read up on that. I have an infant and sometimes I want to capture quick actions and I miss them due to the delay. Other than that I am having lots of fun with my camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: db120
Reviews.Content: So far so good! Bought it as a gift for someone and they liked it.I like all the stuff that it comes with. A ton of batteries. FYI, mini-tripod is very mini.

Reviews.Title: great camera bundle
Reviews.Author: writer
Reviews.Content: I have loved everything about this camera. so much better than my old one!! have two very little boys that are usually hard to get pics of but this camera makes it so easy. very user friendly. couldn't be more happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: very nice especially for the price
Reviews.Author: rachel5167
Reviews.Content: I received this camera on a Wednesday and went on a 3 day trip the following weekend.  I used the camera even without having a chance to look over any instructions and found it very simple to use, although my last camera was a fuji.  In fact, that is why I looked to purchase another fuji because I really liked my old one,  it had just seen all the use I could give it.  I then photographed a wedding the next weekend and found the camera absolutely great to use as far as ease, focusing, picture, and I really like the size of it.  You can hold in one hand if needed!  I would recommend this camera to just about anyone except maybe those who are technologically challenged (Ha!) like my MOM. They should probably stick with something a little simpler.

16GB SDHC Memory Card + USB SDHC Card Reader
Eight 2900MaH AA NiMH Rechargeable Batteries plus Rapid Charger
Padded Carrying Case w/ Carrying Strap + Mini Table Top Tripod
